snippet: A Tallis Scholars concert on Saturday at Alice Tully Hall, part of the White Light Festival, included work by John Tavener, who died last week.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Tallis Scholars concert at Alice Tully Hall, part of Lincoln Center's White Light Festival, featuring work by late British composer John Tavener.
lead_paragraph: A Tallis Scholars concert on Saturday at Alice Tully Hall, part of the White Light Festival, included work by John Tavener, who died last week.

headline.seo: Tallis Scholars Feature Taverner Works at White Light Concert
headline.main: Exploring Spirituality, and Ending on a Prayer
headline.print_headline: Exploring Spirituality, And Ending On a Prayer
